employee.role.Administrator.name: Administrator
employee.role.Administrator.description: The administrator has full access to the data and functions of the Houses: he can delete, create or edit anything he wants. Administrators control the created organizations. An organization can have an unlimited number of administrators.
employee.role.Dispatcher.name: Dispatcher
employee.role.Dispatcher.description: Dispatchers interact with the client and the internal services of the CM. Dispatchers fill out applications, leave comments, change statuses, enter information on the readings of metering devices and issue keys. Dispatchers have access to information about customers, charges and technical personnel, but cannot edit, add or delete anything.
employee.role.Manager.name: Manager
employee.role.Manager.description: The manager is the manager of the house: he interacts with clients, monitors the quality, deadlines and fulfillment of orders, controls the finances of the house - manages a house or a group of houses. Within the designated homes, the manager has access to ticket management, employee management, household reports, charges and payments.
employee.role.Foreman.name: Foreman
employee.role.Foreman.description: The site foreman is responsible for the performance and quality of work on the site. The site master distributes tasks to performers and configures routing.
employee.role.Technician.name: Technician
employee.role.Technician.description: The technician works with tasks and performs work. The technician does not have access to other sections and capabilities of the system, except for applications.
